20  enum {
21  LAUNCH_OPTIONS_FLASH = LINK_APPFS_EXEC_OPTIONS_FLASH,
22  LAUNCH_OPTIONS_STARTUP = LINK_APPFS_EXEC_OPTIONS_STARTUP,
23  LAUNCH_OPTIONS_ROOT = LINK_APPFS_EXEC_OPTIONS_ROOT,
24  LAUNCH_OPTIONS_REPLACE = LINK_APPFS_EXEC_OPTIONS_REPLACE,
25  LAUNCH_OPTIONS_ORPHAN = LINK_APPFS_EXEC_OPTIONS_ORPHAN,
26  LAUNCH_RAM_SIZE_DEFAULT = 0
27  };
28 
29  static int launch(const char * path,
30  char * exec_dest = 0,
31  const char * args = 0,
32  int options = 0, //run in RAM, discard on exit
33  int ram_size = LAUNCH_RAM_SIZE_DEFAULT,
34  int (*update_progress)(int, int) = 0,
35  char *const envp[] = 0
36  );
37 
38  static void powerdown(int count = 0);
39  static int hibernate(int count = 0);
40 
41  inline int open(int mode = Sys::READWRITE){
42  return Device::open("/dev/sys", mode);
43  }
44 
45  int getattr(sys_attr_t & attr);
46  int taskattr(sys_taskattr_t * attr, int task = -1);
47 
48  inline int taskattr(sys_taskattr_t & attr, int task = -1){
49  return taskattr(&attr, task);
50  }
51 
52 
53
